26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_engine_fifo_nv04.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:31 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include "nv04.h"
30#include "channv04.h"
31#include "regsnv04.h"
32
33#include <core/client.h>
34#include <core/ramht.h>
35#include <subdev/instmem.h>
36#include <subdev/timer.h>
37#include <engine/sw.h>
38
39static const struct nv04_fifo_ramfc
40nv04_fifo_ramfc[] = {
41 { 32, 0, 0x00, 0, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_DMA_PUT },
42 { 32, 0, 0x04, 0, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_DMA_GET },
43 { 16, 0, 0x08, 0, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_DMA_INSTANCE },
44 { 16, 16, 0x08, 0, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_DMA_DCOUNT },
45 { 32, 0, 0x0c, 0, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_DMA_STATE },
46 { 32, 0, 0x10, 0, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_DMA_FETCH },
47 { 32, 0, 0x14, 0, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_ENGINE },
48 { 32, 0, 0x18, 0, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_PULL1 },
49 {}
50};
51
52void
53nv04_fifo_pause(struct nvkm_fifo *base, unsigned long *pflags)
54__acquires(fifo->base.lock)
55{
56 struct nv04_fifo *fifo = nv04_fifo(base);
57 struct nvkm_device *device = fifo->base.engine.subdev.device;
58 unsigned long flags;
59
60 spin_lock_irqsave(&fifo->base.lock, flags);
61 *pflags = flags;
62
63 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_CACHES, 0x00000000);
64 nvkm_mask(device, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_PULL0, 0x00000001, 0x00000000);
65
66 /* in some cases the puller may be left in an inconsistent state
67 * if you try to stop it while it's busy translating handles.
68 * sometimes you get a CACHE_ERROR, sometimes it just fails
69 * silently; sending incorrect instance offsets to PGRAPH after
70 * it's started up again.
71 *
72 * to avoid this, we invalidate the most recently calculated
73 * instance.
74 */
75 nvkm_msec(device, 2000,
76 u32 tmp = nvkm_rd32(device, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_PULL0);
77 if (!(tmp & NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_PULL0_HASH_BUSY))
78 break;
79 );
80
81 if (nvkm_rd32(device, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_PULL0) &
82 NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_PULL0_HASH_FAILED)
83 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_INTR_0, NV_PFIFO_INTR_CACHE_ERROR);
84
85 nvkm_wr32(device, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_HASH, 0x00000000);
86}
87
88void
89nv04_fifo_start(struct nvkm_fifo *base, unsigned long *pflags)
90__releases(fifo->base.lock)
91{
92 struct nv04_fifo *fifo = nv04_fifo(base);
93 struct nvkm_device *device = fifo->base.engine.subdev.device;
94 unsigned long flags = *pflags;
95
96 nvkm_mask(device, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_PULL0, 0x00000001, 0x00000001);
97 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_CACHES, 0x00000001);
98
99 spin_unlock_irqrestore(&fifo->base.lock, flags);
100}
101
102static const char *
103nv_dma_state_err(u32 state)
104{
105 static const char * const desc[] = {
106 "NONE", "CALL_SUBR_ACTIVE", "INVALID_MTHD", "RET_SUBR_INACTIVE",
107 "INVALID_CMD", "IB_EMPTY"/* NV50+ */, "MEM_FAULT", "UNK"
108 };
109 return desc[(state >> 29) & 0x7];
110}
111
112static bool
113nv04_fifo_swmthd(struct nvkm_device *device, u32 chid, u32 addr, u32 data)
114{
115 struct nvkm_sw *sw = device->sw;
116 const int subc = (addr & 0x0000e000) >> 13;
117 const int mthd = (addr & 0x00001ffc);
118 const u32 mask = 0x0000000f << (subc * 4);
119 u32 engine = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x003280);
120 bool handled = false;
121
122 switch (mthd) {
123 case 0x0000 ... 0x0000: /* subchannel's engine -> software */
124 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x003280, (engine &= ~mask));
125 case 0x0180 ... 0x01fc: /* handle -> instance */
126 data = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x003258) & 0x0000ffff;
127 case 0x0100 ... 0x017c:
128 case 0x0200 ... 0x1ffc: /* pass method down to sw */
129 if (!(engine & mask) && sw)
130 handled = nvkm_sw_mthd(sw, chid, subc, mthd, data);
131 break;
132 default:
133 break;
134 }
135
136 return handled;
137}
138
139static void
140nv04_fifo_cache_error(struct nv04_fifo *fifo, u32 chid, u32 get)
141{
142 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &fifo->base.engine.subdev;
143 struct nvkm_device *device = subdev->device;
144 struct nvkm_fifo_chan *chan;
145 unsigned long flags;
146 u32 pull0 = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x003250);
147 u32 mthd, data;
148 int ptr;
149
150 /* NV_PFIFO_CACHE1_GET actually goes to 0xffc before wrapping on my
151 * G80 chips, but CACHE1 isn't big enough for this much data.. Tests
152 * show that it wraps around to the start at GET=0x800.. No clue as to
153 * why..
154 */
155 ptr = (get & 0x7ff) >> 2;
156
157 if (device->card_type < NV_40) {
158 mthd = nvkm_rd32(device, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_METHOD(ptr));
159 data = nvkm_rd32(device, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_DATA(ptr));
160 } else {
161 mthd = nvkm_rd32(device, NV40_PFIFO_CACHE1_METHOD(ptr));
162 data = nvkm_rd32(device, NV40_PFIFO_CACHE1_DATA(ptr));
163 }
164
165 if (!(pull0 & 0x00000100) ||
166 !nv04_fifo_swmthd(device, chid, mthd, data)) {
167 chan = nvkm_fifo_chan_chid(&fifo->base, chid, &flags);
168 nvkm_error(subdev, "CACHE_ERROR - "
169 "ch %d [%s] subc %d mthd %04x data %08x\n",
170 chid, chan ? chan->object.client->name : "unknown",
171 (mthd >> 13) & 7, mthd & 0x1ffc, data);
172 nvkm_fifo_chan_put(&fifo->base, flags, &chan);
173 }
174
175 nvkm_wr32(device, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_DMA_PUSH, 0);
176 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_INTR_0, NV_PFIFO_INTR_CACHE_ERROR);
177
178 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_CACHE1_PUSH0,
179 nvkm_rd32(device, NV03_PFIFO_CACHE1_PUSH0) & ~1);
180 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_CACHE1_GET, get + 4);
181 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_CACHE1_PUSH0,
182 nvkm_rd32(device, NV03_PFIFO_CACHE1_PUSH0) | 1);
183 nvkm_wr32(device, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_HASH, 0);
184
185 nvkm_wr32(device, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_DMA_PUSH,
186 nvkm_rd32(device, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_DMA_PUSH) | 1);
187 nvkm_wr32(device, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_PULL0, 1);
188}
189
190static void
191nv04_fifo_dma_pusher(struct nv04_fifo *fifo, u32 chid)
192{
193 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &fifo->base.engine.subdev;
194 struct nvkm_device *device = subdev->device;
195 u32 dma_get = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x003244);
196 u32 dma_put = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x003240);
197 u32 push = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x003220);
198 u32 state = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x003228);
199 struct nvkm_fifo_chan *chan;
200 unsigned long flags;
201 const char *name;
202
203 chan = nvkm_fifo_chan_chid(&fifo->base, chid, &flags);
204 name = chan ? chan->object.client->name : "unknown";
205 if (device->card_type == NV_50) {
206 u32 ho_get = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x003328);
207 u32 ho_put = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x003320);
208 u32 ib_get = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x003334);
209 u32 ib_put = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x003330);
210
211 nvkm_error(subdev, "DMA_PUSHER - "
212 "ch %d [%s] get %02x%08x put %02x%08x ib_get %08x "
213 "ib_put %08x state %08x (err: %s) push %08x\n",
214 chid, name, ho_get, dma_get, ho_put, dma_put,
215 ib_get, ib_put, state, nv_dma_state_err(state),
216 push);
217
218 /* METHOD_COUNT, in DMA_STATE on earlier chipsets */
219 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x003364, 0x00000000);
220 if (dma_get != dma_put || ho_get != ho_put) {
221 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x003244, dma_put);
222 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x003328, ho_put);
223 } else
224 if (ib_get != ib_put)
225 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x003334, ib_put);
226 } else {
227 nvkm_error(subdev, "DMA_PUSHER - ch %d [%s] get %08x put %08x "
228 "state %08x (err: %s) push %08x\n",
229 chid, name, dma_get, dma_put, state,
230 nv_dma_state_err(state), push);
231
232 if (dma_get != dma_put)
233 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x003244, dma_put);
234 }
235 nvkm_fifo_chan_put(&fifo->base, flags, &chan);
236
237 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x003228, 0x00000000);
238 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x003220, 0x00000001);
239 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x002100, NV_PFIFO_INTR_DMA_PUSHER);
240}
241
242void
243nv04_fifo_intr(struct nvkm_fifo *base)
244{
245 struct nv04_fifo *fifo = nv04_fifo(base);
246 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &fifo->base.engine.subdev;
247 struct nvkm_device *device = subdev->device;
248 u32 mask = nvkm_rd32(device, NV03_PFIFO_INTR_EN_0);
249 u32 stat = nvkm_rd32(device, NV03_PFIFO_INTR_0) & mask;
250 u32 reassign, chid, get, sem;
251
252 reassign = nvkm_rd32(device, NV03_PFIFO_CACHES) & 1;
253 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_CACHES, 0);
254
255 chid = nvkm_rd32(device, NV03_PFIFO_CACHE1_PUSH1) & (fifo->base.nr - 1);
256 get = nvkm_rd32(device, NV03_PFIFO_CACHE1_GET);
257
258 if (stat & NV_PFIFO_INTR_CACHE_ERROR) {
259 nv04_fifo_cache_error(fifo, chid, get);
260 stat &= ~NV_PFIFO_INTR_CACHE_ERROR;
261 }
262
263 if (stat & NV_PFIFO_INTR_DMA_PUSHER) {
264 nv04_fifo_dma_pusher(fifo, chid);
265 stat &= ~NV_PFIFO_INTR_DMA_PUSHER;
266 }
267
268 if (stat & NV_PFIFO_INTR_SEMAPHORE) {
269 stat &= ~NV_PFIFO_INTR_SEMAPHORE;
270 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_INTR_0, NV_PFIFO_INTR_SEMAPHORE);
271
272 sem = nvkm_rd32(device, NV10_PFIFO_CACHE1_SEMAPHORE);
273 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PFIFO_CACHE1_SEMAPHORE, sem | 0x1);
274
275 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_CACHE1_GET, get + 4);
276 nvkm_wr32(device, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_PULL0, 1);
277 }
278
279 if (device->card_type == NV_50) {
280 if (stat & 0x00000010) {
281 stat &= ~0x00000010;
282 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x002100, 0x00000010);
283 }
284
285 if (stat & 0x40000000) {
286 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x002100, 0x40000000);
287 nvkm_fifo_uevent(&fifo->base);
288 stat &= ~0x40000000;
289 }
290 }
291
292 if (stat) {
293 nvkm_warn(subdev, "intr %08x\n", stat);
294 nvkm_mask(device, NV03_PFIFO_INTR_EN_0, stat, 0x00000000);
295 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_INTR_0, stat);
296 }
297
298 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_CACHES, reassign);
299}
300
301void
302nv04_fifo_init(struct nvkm_fifo *base)
303{
304 struct nv04_fifo *fifo = nv04_fifo(base);
305 struct nvkm_device *device = fifo->base.engine.subdev.device;
306 struct nvkm_instmem *imem = device->imem;
307 struct nvkm_ramht *ramht = imem->ramht;
308 struct nvkm_memory *ramro = imem->ramro;
309 struct nvkm_memory *ramfc = imem->ramfc;
310
311 nvkm_wr32(device, NV04_PFIFO_DELAY_0, 0x000000ff);
312 nvkm_wr32(device, NV04_PFIFO_DMA_TIMESLICE, 0x0101ffff);
313
314 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_RAMHT, (0x03 << 24) /* search 128 */ |
315 ((ramht->bits - 9) << 16) |
316 (ramht->gpuobj->addr >> 8));
317 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_RAMRO, nvkm_memory_addr(ramro) >> 8);
318 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_RAMFC, nvkm_memory_addr(ramfc) >> 8);
319
320 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_CACHE1_PUSH1, fifo->base.nr - 1);
321
322 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_INTR_0, 0xffffffff);
323 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_INTR_EN_0, 0xffffffff);
324
325 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_CACHE1_PUSH0, 1);
326 nvkm_wr32(device, NV04_PFIFO_CACHE1_PULL0, 1);
327 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PFIFO_CACHES, 1);
328}
329
330int
331nv04_fifo_new_(const struct nvkm_fifo_func *func, struct nvkm_device *device,
332 int index, int nr, const struct nv04_fifo_ramfc *ramfc,
333 struct nvkm_fifo **pfifo)
334{
335 struct nv04_fifo *fifo;
336 int ret;
337
338 if (!(fifo = kzalloc(sizeof(*fifo), GFP_KERNEL)))
339 return -ENOMEM;
340 fifo->ramfc = ramfc;
341 *pfifo = &fifo->base;
342
343 ret = nvkm_fifo_ctor(func, device, index, nr, &fifo->base);
344 if (ret)
345 return ret;
346
347 set_bit(nr - 1, fifo->base.mask); /* inactive channel */
348 return 0;
349}
350
351static const struct nvkm_fifo_func
352nv04_fifo = {
353 .init = nv04_fifo_init,
354 .intr = nv04_fifo_intr,
355 .pause = nv04_fifo_pause,
356 .start = nv04_fifo_start,
357 .chan = {
358 &nv04_fifo_dma_oclass,
359 NULL
360 },
361};
362
363int
364nv04_fifo_new(struct nvkm_device *device, int index, struct nvkm_fifo **pfifo)
365{
366 return nv04_fifo_new_(&nv04_fifo, device, index, 16,
367 nv04_fifo_ramfc, pfifo);
368}
